title: Odisha police warns against bid to create communal disharmony using train tragedy.
selftext: Help me understand how does this become a communal issue?
comments: Because Mandirs are turning into masjid,if any mishap happening nearby.
Well. Dont just warn, start arresting people?

Odisha Police doesn't have any jurisdiction outside Odisha. Most of those giving it a communal colour don't actually reside in India. Chances are most of them hadn't even heard of Odisha before the incident

Hmm.. Yes but Delhi Police arrest people from Bangalore. 

https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/delhi-cops-pick-up-22-year-old-girl-from-bengaluru-for-sedition-in-greta-toolkit-case/articleshow/80915712.cms
Delhi police come under the Central Government Home Ministry not under state administration.
